Identification.LongTitle: Non-Article 5 North Atlantic Treaty Organisation (NATO) Medal for the NATO Training Mission in Iraq Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the Non-Article 5 North Atlantic Treaty Organisation (NATO) Medal for the NATO Training Mission in Iraq, with a “Non-Article 5” bar, in recognition of honourable service in operations, commencing on or after August 18, 2004, other than those conducted according to Article 5 of the North Atlantic Treaty; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the Medal follow the Non-Article 5 North Atlantic Treaty Organisation (NATO) Medal for Operations in the Balkans, in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
